name: A bright and rich tomorrow
description:
Gothenburg's growth after the second world war was never as romantic as once thought. The truth of Gothenburg's horrifying rise was hidden bind Stockholm's propaganda for many years. Live the cruelty of a forgotten past, as you are forced to play by its rules.

Made by:

Game and story design: Enok Nord, https://eckop01.wixsite.com/portfolio

Sound Design: Ana Anastasov, https://linktr.ee/ananastasov

Music Composition: Sara Sheikhi, instagram.com/kristallhavet, Facebook: Sara Sheikhi

Programmer and Creative Designer: David Zetterdahl, https://lorddz.itch.io/

Programmer: Tilda B

Narrative was worked on by all members.

Attributions:
